Text:
Thank you! I read this in my teens and really appreciated it then - it'll be interesting to see how it stands the test of time.

I'll seed to at least 3.0 if I get all of it.
Would be willing to help seed for about 30 straight days if this goes through.
does anyone else have the problem of a few of the books being read at a really high speed??  sounds like the Chipmunks are reading the books...
for some reason the first book in the set causes MAJOR errors and system crash when opened for me, i'm gonna tear it apart and see why....
What the heck is a .m4b and how do i listen to it?

You have to use Quicktime Player to listen to these books mpb4 is the encoding type used for ipods and quicktime. i used Tunebite software and converted them to MP3 to use on other players hope this helps
Ill keep it up for a few weeks thanks yall
thank you for providing this one!
